meanings.sent1: The anelasticity of the rubber band made it difficult to stretch.
meanings.sent2: The anelasticity of the old mattress made it uncomfortable to sleep on.
meanings.sent3: The anelasticity of the slinky toy made it flop around in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The anelasticity of time seemed to slow down during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent5: The anelasticity of the balloon made it impossible to blow up any further.

meanings.sent1: The anelasticity of demand for basic goods often leads to price fluctuations.
meanings.sent2: The anelasticity of the market caused prices to remain stable despite changes.
meanings.sent3: The anelasticity of the rubber band made it bounce back unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The anelasticity of the situation left no room for negotiation.
meanings.sent5: The anelasticity of the rope made it difficult to tie securely.

meanings.definition: Not capable of returning to its original shape after being deformed
meanings.sent1: The anelasticity of the clay sculpture made it prone to cracking.
meanings.sent2: The anelasticity of the plastic ruler caused it to stay bent out of shape.
meanings.sent3: The anelasticity of the sponge cake resulted in a lopsided dessert.
meanings.sent4: The anelasticity of the metal wire made it permanently twisted.
meanings.sent5: The anelasticity of the rubber ball left it misshapen after being squeezed.
